pullRequest.title: [RW-5614][risk=low] Egress alert updates
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes:

Update to reference new vm_prefix field instead of vm_name
Include egress breakdown by machine type

nodes.bodyText: nit: I would probably inline this and add the doc string to the runtimeName property on DbUser.

So is an alert created if a combination of egress from these sources adds up to a value exceeding the threshold, or only if a single one triggers it? Are we moving toward a system where there could be different thresholds or windows for different sources?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -5858,6 +5858,28 @@ definitions:
           (MiB).
         type: number
         format: double
+      gce_egress_mib:
